PaymentRequest.name: PaymentRequest
PaymentRequest.description: Represents a financial compensation request for goods or services provided by a third party.

ClaimId.description: The claim associated with the payment request.

DueDate.description: The due date of the payment request.

EndDateTime.description: The end date of services represented in the payment request.

FacilityId.description: The facility associated with the payment request.

InsurancePolicyId.description: The insurance policy associated with the payment request.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the Payment Request.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

ReceivedDate.description: The date on which the recipient received the payment request.

ReceivedMethod.description: The method in which the payment request was received.

ReferenceNumber.description: External unique identifier from the submitting party, such as an invoice number.

RemittanceAccountId.description: The account that receives the remittance payment for the services.

ServiceProviderId.description: The service provider associated with the payment request.

ServiceRecipientId.description: The account that receives the services in the payment request.

StartDateTime.description: The start date of services represented in the payment request.

SubmissionType.description: Type of payment request submission, such as an invoice from a service provider.

SubmittedDate.description: The date on which the service provider submitted the payment request.

SubmittingAccountId.description: The billing account that submits the payment to the service recipient.

TotalAdjustmentAmount.description: Total amount that is adjusted, such as the collection of a copay onsite.

TotalServiceAmount.description: Total amount of the services, such as the total services billed.
